DataElement.preferredName: Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Greater Than or Equal To Six Month Duration Pain Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed that is a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator related to the sensation of discomfort from any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint for greater than or equal to 6 months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Greater Than or Equal To Six Month Duration Pain
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the sensation of discomfort from any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint for greater than or equal to 6 months.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.

Concepts.definition: A disorder that affects the masticatory muscles and temporomandibular joint.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To Six Month Duration Pain
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The period of time during which something continues.:An unpleasant sensation induced by noxious stimuli and generally received by specialized nerve endings.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The period of time during which something continues.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed that is a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/23/18 jk chg reg status to Standard as part of RECIST FG content; reused by 30 CDEs and multiple SOs. 10-19-2018 TMT received permission from BC to transfer ownership from NIDCR to NCI Standards.
